name: Premier Supports, LLC
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Premier Supports, LLC is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Somerset, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $71.4M in Medicaid payments across 144K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $71.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
